text: @realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr You might want to rethink your law and order mantra. Separating migrant children from their parents, moving them all over. Gassing lawful protesters, defense of White Supremacists in Charlottesville, lying about the coronavirus. Just to name a few. Ppl won't buy your lies now.
